bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from D.E. Leavitt to Emilie Lawrence Reed, May 31, 1927

div1.p: This letter, written by a student of Edith R. Force, thanks Emilie Lawrence Reed for the life and work of Walter Reed.

div1.head: Letter from D.E. Leavitt to Emilie Lawrence Reed, May 31, 1927
div1.p:
As a student of Woodrow Wilson Jr.
High who is now studying about
the disease of Yellow Fever, that you
and your husband risked your lives
to make it clear to Doctors and other
Physicians I want to thank you for
your faithful work.
